body_content.explanation: (of a place or area) where a lot of people pass through or where people pass through very often:
examples: Surveillance cameras have been installed near high-traffic shopping and dining locations.
Schools were required to inform students by posting a notice in a high traffic area.
She suggests keeping the family computer in a high-traffic part of the house like the kitchen.

body_content.explanation: (of a road, etc.) used by a large number of vehicles:
examples: Avoid exercising in high-traffic areas, where exhaust fumes can irritate your lungs.
The highway patrol will focus on high traffic areas around Manhattan.

body_content.explanation: (of a website, etc.) visited or used by a large number of people:
examples: They use banner advertising on high-traffic sites.
You may be making a small, simple website, or a high powered, high traffic website.
